title: Application Support - Google Workspace Sync Issue
description: A user reports that their Google Drive is not syncing files from their desktop.

tasks.description: Check the Google Workspace status dashboard for any known issues.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician confirms there are no widespread issues with Google Drive.

tasks.description: Guide the user to pause and resume syncing in the Google Drive desktop client.
tasks.expected_outcome: This simple step does not resolve the issue.

tasks.description: Instruct the user to sign out of the Google Drive client, and then sign back in to force a re-authentication and re-sync.
tasks.expected_outcome: This action resolves the sync issue, and files begin syncing correctly.
